text:
Myth-Buster #3 - Is the NHS confident the vaccine is safe?

Yes. The NHS will not offer any Covid-19 vaccinations to the public until independent experts have signed off that it is safe to do so.

#DontHesitateVaccinate #NHS #Covid19 #Vaccine

Source: NHS, https://t.co/UT2qssCIpA https://t.co/4KvrMaGPO1
